resources.string: Curious to see how well do you know the 50 state capitals?\nTest yourself by taking our Quiz! We will ask you about 6 states chosen randomly .. \nLets See How Good You Are!!

1. You'll be asked 6 questions. 
2. For each, you'll be provided with 3 options. 
3. You can check your answer by clicking the "Check Answer" button 
4. To move to the next question, swipe right to left 

When READY, Swipe to Left ‚Üê to Start
